name: Nuclear: Break Code
description:
An Elegant chain reaction game to Break a Nuclear Code with Move a Nuclear Ball

- Move a Nuclear into a Circle to get Chance win
- you can play with User v/s User
- we are set a User v/s Computer Mode
- Each level Easy to Hard Move.

FEATURES:
*************
✔ Bit a Ball into Go Next Level
✔ Move the Ball into Level Wise
✔ Each Level Move into Hard
✔ Engage nuclear Code with Computer!!! Each with different bonuses and more code coming up in our next update!!!
✔ Gather uranium resources to build powerful you.!
✔ Massively Multiplayer with FREE updates with new missions, units, buildings, and more!
✔ Battle other players LIVE with massive armies!
✔ Experience gorgeous graphics and a rich storyline.
✔ Dynamic and numerous mission system
✔ Get real time updates
✔ Real time Playing.
✔ and much, much more!

UNIQUE FEATURES:
************************
✔ You can build ✭User v/s User✭ to utilize powerful weapon
✔ Diffrent Level
- Easy Mode
- Medium Mode
- Hard Mode
✔ Cool Sound
✔ Completely FREE Game
✔ Easy and relaxing to play, hard to fully master
✔ Enjoyable game for EVERYONE: Kid, Adult, Commuter, Girl, Boy, Housewives, Elderly etc.
✔ Play whenever and wherever you want: WIFI is not a must for Game
✔ Cool Sound
✔ Great Graphics

Download and join Nuclear : Break Code game NOW!
